DOC.brief_summary: Beta2-mimetics Salbutamol show ergogenic effect . Acute chronic inhale oral dos Salbutamol show increase whole body exercise muscle performance . The underlie mechanism however unclear . Some data suggest Salbutamol may effect central nervous system may explain improved exercise neuromuscular performance . The present study aim assess effect acite inhaled oral Salbutamol intake neuromuscular system use neurostimulation technique magnetic resonance imaging .
DOC.detailed_description: The effect Salbutamol intake assess use transcranial magnetic stimulation one hand magnetic resonance imaging hand . Maximal voluntary activation cerebral activation measure motor task perform exhaustion acute inhale slabutamol intake , acture oral salbutamol intake oral placebo intake .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject without respiratory cordiovascular disease Male Age 18 35 Trained subject ( > 6 hour physical activity per week ) Non exsmoker ( smoke cessation since least 1 year ) Respiratory , cardiovascular metabolic diseases Neuromuscular disease thyrotoxicosis , diabetes treated insulin alcoholism MRI contraindication TMS contraindication
